name: Femme Fatale
tagline: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

name: Millions
tagline: Ethics, being human and the soul come to the fore when a 7-year old finds a bag of Pounds just days before the currency is switched to Euros and learns what we are really made of.

name: Once Upon a Forest
tagline: A young mouse, mole and hedgehog risk their lives to find a cure for their badger friend, who's been poisoned by men.

name: Curse of the Golden Flower
tagline: During China's Tang dynasty the emperor has taken the princess of a neighboring province as wife. She has borne him two sons and raised his eldest. Now his control over his dominion is complete, including the royal family itself.

name: Strange Wilderness
tagline: With the ratings dropping for a wilderness-themed TV show, two animal fans go to the Andes in search of Bigfoot.

name: Lost & Found
tagline: In order to impress his beautiful French neighbor, Dylan Ramsey dognaps her pet pooch so he can return him and become a hero. Unfortunately, things do not work out as planned.

name: Winter's Bone
tagline: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

name: The Rules of Attraction
tagline: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

name: 3 Idiots
tagline: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: Maria Full of Grace
tagline: A pregnant Colombian teenager becomes a drug mule to make some desperately needed money for her family.

name: The Road to Wellville
tagline: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early 20th century, run by the eccentric Dr. Kellogg.

name: Star 80
tagline: A successful young model finds trouble when her obsessive manager-turned-husband becomes dangerously jealous. Based on the true story of 1980 Playmate of the Year Dorothy Stratten.

name: Teacher's Pet
tagline: Spot (Lane) is a dog who can talk and read. Posing as a human, he sneaks into school with his master Leonard (Flemming). Educational adventures ensue.

name: Switchback
tagline: An FBI agent tries to catch a serial killer who kidnapped his son.

name: The Real McCoy
tagline: A woman is released from prison, an expert bank robber who wants to settle down and go straight, but her parole officer and her former employer try to get her to pull one more heist.

name: The Big Bounce
tagline: A small-time con artist and a Hawaiian real estate developer's mischevious, enterprising mistress team up for a potential $200,000 score.

name: Mac and Me
tagline: A Mysterious Alien Creature (MAC ?) trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a young boy in a wheel chair.

name: Brideshead Revisited
tagline: A poignant story of forbidden love and the loss of innocence set in England prior to the Second World War.

name: Defenseless
tagline: A lawyer is hired to defend an old college friend accused of murdering her husband.

name: Six Degrees of Separation
tagline: An affluent New York couple find their lives touched, intruded upon, and compelled by a mysterious young black man who is never quite who he says he is.

name: Just Between Friends
tagline: Holly and Sandy strike up an instant friendship; they don't know however that they have more in common than they'd like. When tragedy strikes, their relationship is tested.

name: My Own Private Idaho
tagline: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

name: The Secret in Their Eyes
tagline: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

name: The Aristocrats
tagline: One hundred superstar comedians tell the same very, VERY dirty, filthy joke--one shared privately by comics since Vaudeville.

name: Post Grad
tagline: Ryden Malby graduates from college and is forced to move back into her childhood home with her eccentric family, while she attempts to find a job, the right guy, and just a hint of where her life is headed.

name: Hyde Park on Hudson
tagline: The story of the love affair between FDR and his distant cousin Margaret "Daisy" Suckley, centered around the weekend in 1939 when the King and Queen of the United Kingdom visited upstate New York.

name: It's Kind of a Funny Story
tagline: A clinically depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.

name: The Unholy
tagline: A priest battles a demon that kills sinners in the act of sinning.

name: Most Wanted
tagline: A Marine on death row is recruited by a shadowy U.S. military officer as part of a top-secret ops team, then gets framed for murder when the team and it's officer set him up as the fall guy for the assassination of the First Lady.

name: Affliction
tagline: A deeply troubled small town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while events occur that cause him to mentally disintergrate.

name: The Jacket
tagline: A Gulf war veteran is wrongly sent to a mental institution for insane criminals, where he becomes the object of a Doctor's experiments, and his life is completely affected by them.

name: Alice's Restaurant
tagline: A cinematic adaption of Arlo Guthrie's classic song story.

production.name: What Planet Are You From? Productions

name: The Gods Must Be Crazy II
Ed
tagline: A trained chimpanzee plays third base for a minor-league baseball team.

name: One Night at McCool's
tagline: Every man has a different recollection of the beautiful young woman who wreaked havoc on their lives during one heated night.

name: A Night in the Life of Jimmy Reardon
Music Box
tagline: A lawyer defends her father accused of war crimes, but there is more to the case than she suspects.

name: All Is Lost
tagline: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.

name: Dick
tagline: Story of two girls who wander away from a White House tour and meet President Nixon.

name: Mambo italiano
tagline: The son of Italian immigrants to Canada struggles to find the best way to reveal to his parents that he's gay.

name: Night and the City
tagline: The story about a cheating and incompetent lawyer (Harry Fabian) who suddenly gets obsessed on becoming a boxing promoter.

name: Topsy-Turvy
tagline: After Gilbert and Sullivan's latest play is critically panned, the frustrated team threatens to disband until it is inspired to write the masterpiece "The Mikado."

name: Ghost World
tagline: With only the plan of moving in together after high school, two unusually devious friends seek direction in life. As a mere gag, they respond to a man's newspaper ad for a date, only to find it will greatly complicate their lives.

name: Croupier
tagline: An aspiring writer is hired as a croupier at a casino, where he realizes that his life as a croupier would make a great novel.

name: The Straight Story
tagline: An old man makes a long journey by tractor to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

name: Justin Bieber's Believe
tagline: A backstage and on-stage look at Justin Bieber during his rise to super stardom.

name: Nowhere in Africa
tagline: A German Jewish refugee family moves to and adjusts to a farm life in 1930's Kenya.

name: A Very Long Engagement
tagline: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

name: Rabbit-Proof Fence
tagline: In 1931, three aboriginal girls escape after being plucked from their homes to be trained as domestic staff and set off on a trek across the Outback.

name: UHF
tagline: A local public station gets a new owner. The station becomes a hit, with all sorts of hilarious sight gags and wacky humor.

name: Barton Fink
tagline: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

name: Beyond the Sea

production.name: QI Quality International GmbH & Co. KG

tagline: A swooning study of "Mack the Knife" singer Bobby Darin (Spacey) specifically, and his relationship with his wife Sandra Dee (Bosworth).

name: The Last Seduction
tagline: A devious sexpot steals her husband's drug money and hides out in a small town where she meets the perfect dupe for her next scheme.

name: Folks!
tagline: A slightly self absorbed yuppie takes in his parents including his senile father, after their home burns down. But his personal and professional life fall apart soon after.

name: Almost Heroes
tagline: A road comedy about 2 guys whose mission is to beat Lewis and Clark.

name: Impostor
tagline: In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.

name: Short Cuts
tagline: The day-to-day lives of a number of suburban Los Angeles residents.

name: Coco Before Chanel
tagline: The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world.

name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
tagline: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

name: Grandma's Boy
tagline: A 35 year old video game tester has to move in with his grandma and her two old lady roommates.

name: Kull the Conqueror
tagline: An barbarian warrior becomes a king when he defeats a king in armed combat and the king's heir conspire to overthrow him and reclaim the throne by resurrecting an evil sorceress.

name: The Family Stone
tagline: An uptight, conservative, businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

name: The Way of the Gun
tagline: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

name: American Splendor
tagline: An original mix of fiction and reality illuminates the life of comic book hero everyman Harvey Pekar.

name: Chasing Mavericks
tagline: When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.
